Constant Field Values

PATH_SHARE_MAPPINGS

public static final java.lang.String PATH_SHARE_MAPPINGS
Name of the connection option used to specify the path to share mappings to use for CIFS, specified as a Map<String, String>, e.g. "C:\IBM\WebSphere" -> "WebSphere". If a path is not explicitly mapped to a share the administrative share will be used..

See Also:
Constant Field Values

PATH_SHARE_MAPPINGS_DEFAULT

public static final java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> PATH_SHARE_MAPPINGS_DEFAULT
Default value (empty map) for the connection option used to specify the path to share mappings to use for CIFS.

Name of the connection option used to specify the context (URI) used by WinRM.

Method Detail

connect

public OverthereConnection connect()
Description copied from interface: OverthereConnectionBuilder
Creates the connection that corresponds to the arguments that were passed in the two-arg constructor of this class. The first argument is a String that specifies the type (and is identical to the name field of the Protocol annotation). The second argument is the ConnectionOptions.

Specified by:
connect in interface OverthereConnectionBuilder
Returns:
the created connection.
